reviews.review: I love everything about this game there's always something new and people on here are the best. I've meant so many people and played with them so many times. overall this game is very good and i recommend it to people that like first person shooter.

Great game, would highly recommend. I play on community surf servers every night before bed. Helps me wind down after a long day and process thoughts while I have something to neutralize my ADHD fidgety-ness. Also have spent time making maps for projects at school, which is very fun, as the SDK for mapping, Hammer, comes along with the game. I'd say for sure give that a try.
Cool for tactical play but not something that can be played for a while. The game can be stale and after some time playing the game it would be better to play TF2 or somthing.
the most balanced shooter that has been released in the past 20 years

Es un Juego altamente Competitivo y adictivo, Es necesario tener una computadora decente para poder rendir al maximo en el mismo eso sin mencionar que requieres mas horas de juego para tener la precision bien dominada, los terminos que se usan, aprenderse los mapas, etc. Me gusta mucho el Tipo de juego que es que es "realista" en el sentido de que no andaras por ahí saltando y disparando, Debes prestar atencion a los pasos hacer un pre fire o controlar el retroceso ,etc.

Its a really great game fun to play with alot of online players and it runs great I run it on a Macbook and it runs perfectly still working on getting a better computer but it takes a while to learn and get use to but once you play and learn more its the best game i love the play style the skins the community its fun
